message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you the majority!
Meet me halfway, Bob! 60/40 is a fair split.
You're getting a bit too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
You're getting less value for your money, Bob. I'm taking a firmer stance.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You'll have to meet me at 65/35 or we'll keep negotiating.
You want 65? I'll give you 60, but that's my final offer!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking a firmer stance, 72/28 is my last offer.
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
